explains: adj. <正式>表面上的，貌似的，似是而非的
n. <文>（尤指被认为有欺骗性或不同于现实时的）外表，表象
wordGroup: seem to be 看来，好像
seem like 看起来像；看上去像…；好像…
seem to do 似乎做；好像

sentences.en: She handled the matter with seeming indifference.
sentences.cn: 她看似漫不经心地处理了这件事。

sentences.en: The worst reason to launch an attack would be a fear of seeming irresolute.
sentences.cn: 发起攻击最坏的理由就是因为害怕看起来犹豫不决。

sentences.en: Wall Street analysts have been highly critical of the company's seeming inability to control costs.
sentences.cn: 华尔街的分析家们对该公司似乎无力控制成本一事一直批评甚多。
